jobs.title: Autonomous Vehicles Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Research and development of motion planning software for level 4+ autonomous vehicle applications as apart of Huawei's Noah's Ark Lab
Developed a unit test suite for a Fren√©t frame motion planning stack with 90% code coverage using Google Test
Designed and implemented a path-building library using C++ to aid in the construction of a wide variety of reference paths to test motion planning algorithms on

Used C++ and Matplotlib to implement scripts that collect and save plots of trajectory characteristics over time (position, velocity, acceleration, jerk, road curvature, etc.) to aid in exposing flaws in motion planning algorithms
Wrote a technical report using LaTeX that provided a comprehensive system overview of trajectory generation and evaluation

jobs.title: Automotive ADAS Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Supported bring up of high-performance software initially written for mobile SoCs onto Qualcomm's Snapdragon Ride platform
Developed system and application software for an ADAS & autonomous driving platform in C/C++
Accelerated performance of a computer vision SDK by an average of 20x by leveraging available hardware and software architecture in automotive focused Snapdragon SoCs

jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Worked closely with QA and UI/UX designers for user interface development and maintenance to meet release deadlines across a wide variety of projector platforms using the Qt framework in C++ and QML

Significantly reduced the effort needed to maintain code health through software architecture redesign and setup of a continuous integration pipeline on a Jenkins build server that included unit tests with 90% code coverage using Google Test

User interface and backend development for Christie Conductor, an application that enables efficient control and monitoring of up to 256 projectors. Originally developed to be used at Expo 2020 in Dubai.

jobs.title: Video Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Worked on the video platform for Modus V, a robotic digital microscopy solution for cranial and spinal surgery
Improved visibility of biological tissue during surgical procedures through color manipulation using C++(OpenCV) and C#
Facilitated full control of camera settings through a .NET application that served as a front-end interface to a serial communication protocol
Enabled intuitive usage of a color manipulation algorithm through a web interface built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Post-processed image data in Python using Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib to analyze color manipulation
Used C# to integrate image processing algorithms with existing software architecture in a Windows environment

jobs.title: Industrial Imaging Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Software feature development for PPO's Smart Imaging System, which enables real-time food quality analysis
Developed a robust image acquisition framework using Python and asyncio for rapid line scan imaging of food on an industrial conveyor belt
Implemented image correction algorithms and post-processing for industrial cameras in Python using NumPy, OpenCV, and Matplotlib
Restructured camera control modules in C
Documented software design decisions and a troubleshooting guide to efficiently debug issues pertaining to image acquisition
